comments.author: jameslurker3000
comments.body:
I think most of the places will be closed on 01/01...  
The easiest way is browsing Michelin Guide an calling up all the places.

Most of the nice ones are listed there (with some exceptions like MƒÅsa and Itallisimo).

comments.author: SuperCoolKido
comments.body: Best option is to contact them and see if they are working.
